extendedInfo.description: Camera FV-5 is a professional camera application for mobile devices, that puts DSLR-like manual controls in your fingertips. Tailored to enthusiast and professional photographers, with this camera application you can capture the best raw photographs so that you can post-process them later and get stunning results. The only limit is your imagination and creativity!Major features:â All photographic parameters are adjustable and always at hand: exposure compensation, ISO, light metering mode, focus mode, white balance and program mode.â DSLR-like viewfinder display: see exposure time, aperture and stops display with EV and bracketing settings.â Full fledged exposure bracketing: from 3 to 7 frames, unlimited stops spacing, plus custom EV shifting.â Built-in intervalometer: make stunning timelapses (even bracketed/HDR timelapses) and time-controlled picture series.â Program and Speed-priority modes.â Long exposure support: take beautiful night photos and light trails with long exposure times up to 30 seconds*.â JPEG as well as PNG** image formats for lossless photo capturing, perfect for post-processing.â All camera functions assignable to volume keys. You can adjust EV, ISO, color temperature and more using volume keys. Devices with hardware camera shutter key are also supported.â EXIF and XMP sidecar metadata support.â Self timer for delayed shooting.â Autofocus, macro, touch-to-focus*** and infinity focus modes, plus a focus lock switch (AF-L).â Autoexposure (AE-L) and auto white balance (AWB-L) locks in Android 4.0+.â In background photo developing and processing allows a smooth, uninterrupted camera operation.â Digital zoom using multitouch pinch gesture. Also shows 35mm equivalent focal length!â The most advanced electronic viewfinder: live RGB histogram, 10 composition grid overlays and 9 crop guides available.â Powerful organization options: different storage locations and fully customizable file names (even with variables).â The user interface is available in more than 25 languages.This camera application completely avoids scene modes, instead you get full manual control over all photographic parameters, just like you do with a reflex camera, so you can ultimately control every aspect of the picture, and leave the post-processing to the computer. So after your DSLR, you will never miss a photo opportunity again, being able to capture it with the closer sensation to your DSLR as possible.IMPORTANT: If you find a bug using the application, PLEASE, visit the web page http://www.camerafv5.com or write to camerafv5@flavionet.com with your phone model name and the description of the problem, before writing a negative comment (developers cannot reply to Google Play comments). Customer satisfaction is my priority, and I will do my best to fix the issues as soon as possible!Connect with Camera FV-5 and stay always up to the latest information about current and future development. Visit the official website http://www.camerafv5.com, be a fan of http://www.facebook.com/CameraFV5, subscribe to http://www.twitter.com/CameraFV5 or watch tutorials at http://www.youtube.com/user/camerafv5.* Long exposures lowers picture resolution to 2 or 1 MP, depending models. The reason is explained here: http://www.camerafv5.com/faq.php#long-exposure-resolution** Lossless PNG saving is a memory intensive operation. Some devices might need to raise the memory limit for Camera FV-5 to save PNG pictures. See the FAQ here: http://www.camerafv5.com/faq.php#png-memory*** Touch-to-focus available for Android 4.0+ devices. Under Android 2.x, available only on Motorola, HTC and Nvidia camera drivers, plus some Samsung drivers and other phones.Permissions explained:- Approximate location and precise location: only used for geotagging functionality (disabled by default, and requires manual GPS activation).- Modify or delete the contents of your USB storage and take pictures and videos: required for the usual camera operation.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is a great app. However assigning function to the volume rocker will crash the app and it would be great if the camera sound volume control actually works.
reviews.author: farhan abd razak

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I really like the functionality and flexibility this app offers.
reviews.author: Tharanga Basnayake

reviews.title: Another one xplus issue
reviews.comment: 8mp resolution no longer available on HTC one xplus with 4.2.2 was working previous to a factory restore after 4.2.2 ota
reviews.author: shane henson

reviews.title: The real deal...
reviews.comment: There are a zillion camera apps, but if you take your photography seriously, Camera FV-5 is the only one worth having. Real exposure and focus control combined with the ability to save in the virtually lossless .png format turns an adequate phone camera into a piece of equipment that will produce gallery quality results. If images mean more to you than the usual weekend snapshots, get this app, apply your brain and eye and a little patience, and make something you can really be proud of.
reviews.author: Barye Phillips

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is the only app that can push your phone camera to the limit, but i\'m experiencing focus problems on Xperia Z, macro focus wont work correctly. Please add manual focus control as on Lumia 1020
reviews.author: Ilia Giorgobiani

reviews.title: Galaxy s4 issues
reviews.comment: The iso settings does not work well on the lattest s4 firmware mh8. Pls fix
reviews.author: Dimitar Barashki

reviews.title: Best camera app!
reviews.comment: This is by far the best camera app i ever used. Photos look better and sharper and the possibility to change the settings to whatever is a big+ Keep up the good work!!!!!
reviews.author: Cyby Igor

reviews.title: Like a sale in your phone
reviews.comment: I love it how it let\'s you customize everything, allowing you to be both specific and artistic
reviews.author: \303\211milia Tokes

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Doggies
reviews.author: Scot Diddle

reviews.title: This is the top app for photography lovers.
reviews.comment: If you know something about photography, this is the app for you.
reviews.author: Miguel Pais

reviews.title: Need support for s4 zoom
reviews.comment: Not fully work for s4 zoom, a lot of bug in s4 zoom
reviews.author: Loh Tat Guan

reviews.title: Wow! Exactly what i was looking.
reviews.comment: Just a few minutes with this app and I\'m thrilled. I had several apps to do what this one app does. Unlike similar apps the image quality is what your camera allows. Money well spent. Thank you.
reviews.author: Jojo Pumpkin

reviews.title: Turns Motorola into decent camera
reviews.comment: Have Motorola Razr Maxx HD, great smartphone, average camera. With this app I now take better and faster pictures than wife\'s Samsung Galaxy 3. Very happy customer.
reviews.author: Ken Wilkes

reviews.title: Please, fix it!
reviews.comment: I can\'t imagine taking photos without your app, but something horrible happened after the latest update. There are some flashing stripes on the screen, pictures are deformed, shutter is lagging. I\'m giving 5 anyway, but please, repair it!
reviews.author: Marta Wiktoria

reviews.title: Keeps getting better. :)
reviews.comment: One of my favorites.  Use it quite often. It\'s like actual photography. ;) Thanks for your hard work, great camera. :) Lol.
reviews.author: Douglas Brantley

reviews.title: My favorite camera app!
reviews.comment: I can\'t recommend this app enough.  Excellent support as well, the developer was promt and provided a fix on the next update.  Feature full, this is a must have camera app for people who want more creative control. ig: patrickgwalsh
reviews.author: Patrick Walsh

reviews.title: Learning
reviews.comment: Thought the lite version was good, so bought the full version still learning how to use.
reviews.author: Deepak Ghatge

reviews.title: My Favorite
reviews.comment: I\'m serious about my photography. This camera app helps me push my phone\'s camera hardware to its limits. This is the only camera app that I use every single day. Well worth the price.
reviews.author: Glenn Moses

reviews.title: A Fist Full Of Awesome...
reviews.comment: UPDATE 08 -13 N4 stock hardware now surpasses the photo quality produced by this software....time lapse use only ...................................... it\'s a little slow too load sometimes & can sieze rarely.... no photosphere option - so it isn\'t a total package.... but what it does - it does flawlessly... Don\'t forget that your Nexus 4 auto stitches 5 sequential photos into a GIF on auto-back-up... Time Lapse & extended exposure functions are awesome..
reviews.author: Ashraf El-Masry

reviews.title: Unstable since update
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing (freezing) on HTC One. Was OK before recent major update. Any way of reverting? Was quite good before.
reviews.author: A R Johnson
